attributes.action: PUT A CAP ON BENEFITS FOR SINGLE MOTHERS
attributes.additional_details:
Country is full of many single mothers who see procreation of chidren with diffferent fathers as a business to bring in state money often over 32,000 pounds a year .  see today Telegraph for examples
Cheats, liars, and beggers abound in UK.  Honesty is not paying any more.

ACTION

Limit state benefit to first child only  then they can have as many kids with different fathers as they want (and soon they will stop believe me)  Why should the taxpayer fund a life of rily
